Key Match Events: Steph Curry scored 36 points, had 5 rebounds, and 7 assists in the game
Jonathan Kuminga scored 20 points off the bench
De'Anthony Melton had 19 points, 10 rebounds, and 3 steals as a starter
Andrew Wiggins added 18 points, 8 rebounds, 5 assists, and 3 steals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors improved to 8-2 for the season
The Thunder will have the same record after the game
Others: The Warriors finished the five-game road trip with an impressive 4-1 record
Tuesday's game will be Klay Thompson's first game at the Chase Center since leaving the Warriors in free agency
